question: 留学生
sourceMnemonic: Remember <ja>留学</ja>, which means "study abroad"? Do you also remember <ja>学生</ja>, which is "student"? This word is like those two words mashed together (they share a <ja>学</ja>), making it a "study abroad student." What's a better way to say that? How about <vocabulary>exchange student</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
